page.title: 08FLOGAS
page.content: In Merrylees there is a distribution centre.Flogas moved to Merrylees because of an explosion at a depot at Desford ,3 miles away.Although only minor injuries were suffered.The company moved to the new safer site in October 1984.The site is probably the safest in Europe.If there is serious trouble 60,000 gallons of water per hour can be pumped over the cylinders to prevent an explosion.The site can store 250 tonnes of Liquified Petroleum Gas.The gas is bottled into different coloured containers,the blue bottles are Butane and the red bottles are Propane.7 people work at Flogas in summer and 10 during the winter.In the summer 3 lorries are need to transport the gas but during the peak period which is winter 12 lorries are needed.
